name: SYNOPTIC_RESULT_MAIN
description: This table contains synoptic information for a patient or a requisition grouper.

columns.name: SYNOPTIC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the synoptic result record.

columns.name: SYNOPTIC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the synoptic result record.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_LIST
columns.description: Stores a string of specimen names for this synoptic result record.

columns.name: REC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The deletion status category ID for the synoptic result.

columns.name: SYN_EPT_PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient associated with this synoptic result.

columns.name: SYN_RQG_PAT_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The requisition grouper associated with this synoptic result.
